markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6411) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=264)

**Prerequisites**
[Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6409)

</column>

---

You have trained hard to optimize your armor's unique protective qualities to maximize the materials used in its creation. You gain the armor specialization effects for all armors you are proficient with.
name: Armor Specialist
